html.p: WURFL InSight provides device intelligence about mobile smartphones, tablets and other devices visiting your website. You can drill down on the form factor, device model, operating system version, manufacturer, and over 500 other capabilities. With this mobile device intelligence in Splunk, you can analyze trends in your Web traffic, identify opportunities, and pinpoint problems that are impacting your mobile users.

Marketing business analysts, IT operations, and other analysts across the organization will benefit from WURFL InSight. They can fine tune their mobile Web strategy, improve mobile user experience and interface, gauge the success of advertising campaigns across specific devices, or answer a host of other business questions.

After installing the WURFL InSight for Splunk App, you can use our pre-built dashboard. Additionally, you can write custom lookup searches and pivots. And if you need more information about the device, its capabilities, operating system, or the browser it is using, you can add more WURFL capabilities to suit your needs.

Note: After installing WURFL InSight for Splunk from Splunkbase, you will need to get a license and additional components in order for it to correctly operate. You can obtain a trial, license and necessary additional files by contacting ScientiaMobile here: http://www.scientiamobile.com/insight/inquiry.
